Patches.name: Miku Balls
Patches.description: Change the balls to Miku balls designed by @megurine~

Patches.name: Football Balls
Patches.description: Change the balls to football balls or soccer in degenerated.
Patches.note: Hey, it doesn't mean that you can kick the ball!

Patches.name: Jukebox Collection
Patches.description: A collection of 50+ songs for Jukebox, personally selected by me~ :3
Patches.note: This will overwrite your current Jukebox music list.

Patches.name: [UI] Summer Camp Helper
Patches.description: Help you to do minigame effortlessly, 3 minutes saved every day.

Patches.name: [UI] Cleanner Court
Patches.description: Remove the ugly crew logo on court.

Patches.name: [UI] Simple Background
Patches.description: Replace the animated background with a simple single 4K image. It helps reduce CPU usage.

Patches.name: [UI] Open Dice Shop
Patches.description: Allow you to manual open the Billy's dice shop instead of having to roll for it!
Patches.note: To open the Billy's shop anytime, open the Billy's Dice event and press 9 on keyboard.

Patches.name: [UI] Street Block Helper
Patches.description: Allow you to quick buy 300 by just clicking the buy button and draw up 100 street block puzzles at a time!
Patches.note:
I know right!
[1.1] Unable to drag fixed!

Patches.name: [UI] Shooting Chance
Patches.description: Display the real probability of your shot in plain text, the number is fetched directly from server.

Patches.name: [UI] Auto Login
Patches.description: Automatically log you in as soon as the game finishes loading~

Patches.name: [UI] Brighter Game
Patches.description: Brighten the game by removing the weird shadow overlay.

Patches.name: [UI] Resolution Unlocker
Patches.description: Allow you to change resolution from Option menu while having graphic setting set to low.

Patches.name: [FONT] Better Font
Patches.description: This will change in-game font into the font that looks much much better, it supports almost every language! Except Thailand~ xd
Patches.note:
You can toggle this font via Misc menu~.
[13/07] Compatible fixes.

Patches.name: [STD] Custom Shadow
Patches.description: Change the shadow to anything you wanted. Only works in medium or low graphic.
Patches.note: To change shadow, go to Shader/Shadow folder and edit or replace the pc_shadow.png.

Patches.name: [STD] Uncensored words
Patches.description: Now you can say nice balls without worries of being censored~
Patches.note:
Fully working~
[2/21] Fixed game crashes.
[5/15] Fixed game crashes.
[31/12] Standalone support!

Patches.name: [STD] DX12PXY 2.0
Patches.description: Force the game to use DX12 api proxy, might improve overal FPS, reduce memory leak and crashes.
Patches.note: Many improvements and stability fixes! Full credits to @megai2~ If you encounter bug, please report to me.

Patches.name: [STD] Language pack
Patches.description: Optional patch, includes translation files for another language other than their native version ones.
Patches.note: Added a brandnew font that supports pretty much all language, enable it using MC Voice tweak.

Patches.name: [STD] S_Chinese Enabler
Patches.description: Enable Simplified Chinese for the Global/Korean client. This also includes Chinese translation files fetched from Tiancity.
Patches.note: You can update translation files by using either this patch or Language pack, font included.

Patches.name: [STD] EXIT_CODE lock
Patches.description: Permanently lock the EXIT_TYPE to prevent changes to sclee.dat

Patches.name: [STD] Nudity Project
Patches.description: Makes everyone nude. Not good for human eyes. Hair will be shipped in the next version. Greatly improve FPS and loading speed.
Patches.note: I have warned you~ To revert back just uninstall.

Patches.name: [STD] Custom Court 01
Patches.description: This is basically a blue training court but editable! Occupy the slot 01 on Custom Court.
Patches.note: Read the readme.txt from Data/takatto_tweak_dlc1/custom/data/stage100_training/tutorial for tutorial.

Patches.name: [TEST] katto's Shader
Patches.description: Self-made patch to help my self to navigate whenever i forgot my glasses.
Patches.note: I don't care if you like it or not but feel free to use~
